owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

constructor.notice: Initializes the game with deployed contract addresses.

depositEggToVault(uint256).notice: Allows a player to deposit their egg NFT into the Egg Vault.

eggCounter().notice: Global counter for minted egg token IDs.

eggFindThreshold().notice: Chance (in percent) to find an egg on each search attempt.

eggNFT().notice: References to the EggstravaganzaNFT and EggVault contracts.

eggsFound(address).notice: Tracks the number of eggs found per participant.

getGameStatus().notice: Returns a human-readable status of the game.

getTimeRemaining().notice: Returns the number of seconds remaining in the game.

searchForEgg().notice: Participants call this function to search for an egg. A pseudo-random number is generated and, if below the threshold, an egg is found.

setEggFindThreshold(uint256).notice: Allows the owner to adjust the egg-finding chance.

startGame(uint256).notice: Starts the egg hunt game for a specified duration.

documentation.text: @notice References to the EggstravaganzaNFT and EggVault contracts.
@notice Tracks the number of eggs found per participant.
@notice Global counter for minted egg token IDs.
@notice Chance (in percent) to find an egg on each search attempt.
@notice Initializes the game with deployed contract addresses.
@notice Starts the egg hunt game for a specified duration.
@notice Allows the owner to adjust the egg-finding chance.

@notice Participants call this function to search for an egg.
 A pseudo-random number is generated and, if below the threshold, an egg is found.
@notice Allows a player to deposit their egg NFT into the Egg Vault.
@notice Returns a human-readable status of the game.
@notice Returns the number of seconds remaining in the game.
